item.title: Pricing
item.description: For VaaS (Validator as a Service) hosting fees also apply. Please consult our VaaS FAQ for details. The pricing for hosting fees is disclosed on the application. Introductory offers may apply. Setup fees may apply with some hosting vendors. The hosting fees should be around Â£80/node/month (this is for both primary and backup). The hosting fees vary with the chosen hosting vendors used to deploy primary and backup nodes.
